titleStmt.title: Covent Garden a pleasant comedie: acted in the yeare, MDCXXXII. By the Queenes Majesties Servants. The author Thomas Nabbes.
titleStmt.author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Oulton, for Charles Greene; and are to be sold [by N. Fussell] at the signe of the White Lyon, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Also issued as part of his: Playes, maskes, epigrams, elegies, and epithalamiums: London, 1639.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the White Lyon, in Pauls Church-yard
